div.p: Kenton City Schools is accepting applications for substitute cafeteria positions. No set schedule.¬† Hours would vary. Work coverage could be in any of the three school buildings.
Please send an application to Linda Dickerson at¬†dickersonl@kentoncityschools.org¬†or drop off your completed application to the Board of Education Office at 222 W. Carrol St.
